channel.title: Reasons for inability to import samples
channel.description: im trying to import a sample from icloud that is a 5 second .wav file. when i try to import, it just says “sample could not be imported” and when i went to FAQ all it said was max length 20 seconds and has to be wav/flac. any help? also sorry if there was already a thread for this and i just didnt bother to look.

item.title: Reasons for inability to import samples
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Agree with MM post it here. If it’s not a 16bit wave file it will NOT import.

Read full topic
item.source: Reasons for inability to import samples

item.title: Reasons for inability to import samples
item.dc:creator: icelight
item.description:
I’ve sometimes had this error with importing wav files too. I wasn’t sure why either (they were under 20 seconds) I had to convert my samples to FLAC and it worked

Read full topic
item.source: Reasons for inability to import samples

item.title: Reasons for inability to import samples
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Put your wav online and post the link to it here, so someone else can test it.

Read full topic
item.source: Reasons for inability to import samples

item.title: Reasons for inability to import samples
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
Hmmmmm…
Beat to email the devs from straight inside the app! Tell them what’s going on, and if you could include a screen recording of what’s happening, I’m sure they’ll appreciate it!!

item.title: Reasons for inability to import samples
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
Have you tried importing it again?
This happens to me all the time. I try to import a short sample, and it won’t import, then I try again, and then it does work.

Read full topic
item.source: Reasons for inability to import samples
